entry.title: 0.9.0rc3 tagged
entry.summary: A new version, 0.9.0rc3, has been tagged and users are advised to begin their gitian builds. This version includes a change in the mining code fee policy, which now matches the relay fee policy. Additionally, a rare crash in the wallet code has been fixed and there have been some small changes to the build system, documentation, and GUI. No message regarding this update has been posted on the mailing list yet.
